T02TD2880E:219b-0: @219b * // phyag na rdo rje'i spur bsad las tshogs bsdus pa bzhugs /
T02TD2880E:219b-1: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2880E:219b-2: bsnyen sgrub rtags dang ldan gyur nas //
T02TD2880E:219b-3: sdur zhing bsad pa'i las dag brtsam //
T02TD2880E:219b-4: de yang las tshogs bsdus pa las //
T02TD2880E:219b-5: zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la //
T02TD2880E:219b-6: smyag shad bal po se 'u yi //
T02TD2880E:219b-7: sngags bzlas lcug mas bya bas sam brabs //
T02TD2880E:219b-8: 'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir //
T02TD2880E:219b-9: zhes pa ni spur bsad kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2880E:219b-10: de'ang spur pa ni bskrad pa'i las te /
T02TD2880E:219b-11: thog mar rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyis zhugs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid brtags la /
T02TD2880E:219b-12: nad rnams dbyung zhing gnod pa gdon par bya ba'i thabs ni /
T02TD2880E:219b-13: rgyal po bram ze rje rigs kyi//
T02TD2880E:220a-0: @220a * // gzhon nu gtsang ma shar bltas te //
T02TD2880E:220a-1: dkon mchog gsum dang gos sngon la //
T02TD2880E:220a-2: phyag 'tshal sems bskyed smyag shad blang //
T02TD2880E:220a-3: dag byed sngags bzlas chus bsangs la //
T02TD2880E:220a-4: yungs kar rma bya tshon skud bcings //
T02TD2880E:220a-5: bya ba pa'i rdzas de rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2880E:220a-6: de nas rin chen snod dag tu ;
T02TD2880E:220a-7: / gtso bo klu chen brgyad po dang //
T02TD2880E:220a-8: rigs drug rigs bzhi'i sa bdag gnyen //
T02TD2880E:220a-9: gzugs brnyan byas te klu sman dang //
T02TD2880E:220a-10: dkar gsum rin chen dar zab bcas //
T02TD2880E:220a-11: shing snas mtha' bskor tshon lngas brgyan //
T02TD2880E:220a-12: gzhan yang mchod rdzas thams cad bsogs //
T02TD2880E:220a-13: rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub thabs ltar //
T02TD2880E:220a-14: sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs bya //
T02TD2880E:220a-15: gtso bo gdan gyi klu brgyad las //
T02TD2880E:220a-16: pam las 'dab brgyad nam gyis mtshan //
T02TD2880E:220a-17: de gyur sbrul lam klu chen brgyad //
T02TD2880E:220a-18: btsun mo sras bcas blon po dang //
T02TD2880E:220a-19: sprul pa yang sprul rnams bskyed la //
T02TD2880E:220a-20: de dang 'dra ba bkug bstim mchod //
T02TD2880E:220a-21: dbang bskur gtor ma byin rlabs sbyin //
T02TD2880E:220a-22: aom n'a ga r'a dzab su ta ksha ka karko ta padma ma h'a padma sham kha p'a la ghe la ghe 'u hu lu hu lu ta ge ni ba lim ai dam /
T02TD2880E:220a-23: gri hna gri hna kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD2880E:220a-24: gtor ma byin pas gdug rtsub zhi //
T02TD2880E:220a-25: de nas bdag nyid khro bor bsgom //
T02TD2880E:220a-26: gzungs sngags bzlas shing lcug mas bya ba //
T02TD2880E:220a-27: n'a ga r'a dza bsu ki hri da ya dha ra ya phud phud /
T02TD2880E:220a-37: hri da ya dha ra ya phud phud /
T02TD2880E:220a-38: nad pa la bya ba gzugs la dbab //
T02TD2880E:220a-39: dug phyung khro bo'i che brjod la //
T02TD2880E:220a-40: zla dkyil steng bzhag yam las bskyod //
T02TD2880E:220a-41: n'a ga spha ra na phat ces //
T02TD2880E:220a-42: klu bro bsgags cing dam tshig bsgrags //
T02TD2880E:220a-43: gzungs brgya bzlas la phur zhing bskrad //
T02TD2880E:220a-44: de ltar brgya'am stong byas na //
T02TD2880E:220a-45: klu yin da las grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2880E:220a-46: gzugs brnyan sa'am chu bor dor //
T02TD2880E:220a-48: zhi dang spur bas mi thul zhing //
T02TD2880E:220a-50: de la 'jigs pa'i las brgyad brtsam //
T02TD2880E:220a-51: grog mkhar bdud 'chang tshub ma yi //
T02TD2880E:220a-52: sa las mthing nag gru gsum brtsig / zur gsum lcags kyu brtsegs mas mtshan //
T02TD2880E:220b-0: dbus su ling ga sngon dmar @220b gyis //
T02TD2880E:220b-1: bcings te byad bcug phur la btod //
T02TD2880E:220b-2: mgyogs phur rtsang dang phur pas bskor //
T02TD2880E:220b-3: bye tshan gze ma yungs kar dang //
T02TD2880E:220b-4: tshal zangs lcags dur blugs bcas //
T02TD2880E:220b-5: dmar gtor dug gtor dug thun bsham //
T02TD2880E:220b-6: gru gsum dur khrod g-yam pas bcad //
T02TD2880E:220b-7: dur khrod ras la nam mkha' lding//
T02TD2880E:220b-8: gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug gis //
T02TD2880E:220b-9: ba su ta yi klu rnams 'dzin //
T02TD2880E:220b-10: spyan mig nyi zer rdo rje'i mchu //
T02TD2880E:220b-11: 'khor lo'i gzhug sgro ral gri'i gshog / lus rnams rdo rje'i spu yis gtams //
T02TD2880E:220b-12: de 'dra rgyal rigs kha bstan gzhag / khra spyad nya khra gcan gzan gyi //
T02TD2880E:220b-13: mche sder la sogs khyu rnams bsog / drag po'i mchod yon bsham byas la //
T02TD2880E:220b-14: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rnams //
T02TD2880E:220b-15: na ra'i gos gyon gos sngon gyi //
T02TD2880E:220b-16: so so'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas //
T02TD2880E:220b-17: bsnyen sgrub spur dang gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2880E:220b-18: zhi bas dug phyung gsad pa yi //
T02TD2880E:220b-19: rtse gcig bsgoms te brtson 'grus kyis //
T02TD2880E:220b-20: bar chad med par las la sbyar //
T02TD2880E:220b-21: nag po'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te //
T02TD2880E:220b-22: zhi ba byams pa snying rje bsgom //
T02TD2880E:220b-23: gzungs kyi sngags dang sh'antim bzlas //
T02TD2880E:220b-24: nad dang gdug rtsub zhi bar bsam //
T02TD2880E:220b-25: spur ba gong du bstan pa bzhin //
T02TD2880E:220b-26: gsad ba'i sbyor ba'i drag sngags ni //
T02TD2880E:220b-27: rig pa 'dzin pa h'um yig las //
T02TD2880E:220b-28: gyur te nag po char sprin mdog / smin mtshams dpral bsdus ha ha bzhad //
T02TD2880E:220b-29: rdo rje tshar gcod sdigs mdzub bcas //
T02TD2880E:220b-30: de 'drar bsgoms te yungs kar la //
T02TD2880E:220b-31: sngags bzlas tshangs pa'i gnas su brab //
T02TD2880E:220b-32: shi sa drag po 'di yis gdab //
T02TD2880E:220b-33: yaksha n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02TD2880E:220b-34: ma h'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye de ba ku ru sha na dha ra //
T02TD2880E:220b-35: thog thog thog ril thog thog dar byams sad //
T02TD2880E:220b-36: che ge mo'i lus la rum rum //
T02TD2880E:220b-37: snying la shag shag ma ma sh'anti rbad pu nanti ta sri rbad bu nan /
T02TD2880E:220b-38: n'a gas khrag pu ma m'a ra ya phat //
T02TD2880E:220b-39: yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang //
T02TD2880E:220b-40: tsha la zangs lcags bye tshan char //
T02TD2880E:220b-41: gnam lcags drag po'i sngags des brdeg / gcan gzan mche sder bya khra'i mchu //
T02TD2880E:220b-42: mkha' lding rgyal po'i sngags bzlas brab //
T02TD2880E:220b-43: k'i la ya dang bcas pa'i sngags //
T02TD2880E:220b-44: dus drug phur pas gzir bar bya //
T02TD2880E:221a-0: 'og nas drag po'i rdzas kyis bdug / skyag shang bal @221a * //
T02TD2880E:221a-2: lcug mas brdeg cing rig sngags bzlas //
T02TD2880E:221a-3: g-yas nas gsad cing g-yon nas spur //
T02TD2880E:221a-4: mi bzad rdzas kyis de la byug / gag pa lhog pa byung ba bzhin //
T02TD2880E:221a-5: drag po'i sngags kyis de la gdab //
T02TD2880E:221a-6: bdun nam rtsa gcig bdun tsho bdun //
T02TD2880E:221a-7: de la sogs te bsgrubs gyur na ;
T02TD2880E:221a-8: / n'a ga r'a dza karko ta //
T02TD2880E:221a-9: des zin pa yang grol 'gyur nges //
T02TD2880E:221a-10: phyag na rdo rje'i las bsdus 'di //
T02TD2880E:221a-11: pandi ta rnams kyis mdzad pas //
T02TD2880E:221a-12: mi ma yin rnams skrag cing brgyal //
T02TD2880E:221a-13: des na rnam smin sdig pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2880E:221a-14: de phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs //
T02TD2880E:221a-15: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i spur gsad las tshogs bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2880E:221a-16: slob dpon su p'a g'i shva ra k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
